member.name: T:Vulcan.NET.VulcanKeyboard
member.summary: Static class representing a vulcan Keyboard. Can only interface with one at a time

member.name: P:Vulcan.NET.VulcanKeyboard.IsConnected
member.summary: Returns true if the keyboard is connected

member.name: M:Vulcan.NET.VulcanKeyboard.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the keyboard. Returns true if initialized successfully

member.name: M:Vulcan.NET.VulcanKeyboard.SetColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets the whole keyboard to a color

member.name: M:Vulcan.NET.VulcanKeyboard.SetColors(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{Vulcan.NET.Key,System.Drawing.Color})
member.summary: Set the colors of all the keys in the dictionary

member.name: M:Vulcan.NET.VulcanKeyboard.SetKeyColor(Vulcan.NET.Key,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets a given key to a given color

member.name: M:Vulcan.NET.VulcanKeyboard.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects from the keyboard. Call this last

member.name: T:Vulcan.NET.Key
member.summary: Represents all available keys on the keyboard
